title: Champion Idea: T.R.E.X (Transformable Reptilian Exoskeleton v10)
body:
T.R.E.X (Transformable Reptilian Exoskeleton V10)

Lore
Created in the Labs of Professor Cecil B. Heimerdinger. First creation of this machine could never be controlled and destroyed most of the lab until it was destroyed after the rebuild the transformation sequences could never be operated, then modification after modification the mechanical marvel constructed with a brand new Fighting Bred then Marked T.R.E.X. Armed With A Sword and Shield then Mechanical Beast can destroy the greatest of enemies and marked the beginning of a new age. One night the T.R.E.X was affected by a severe power surge which gave the AI a mind of its own. The beast in terror destroyed the labs it was created in and broke free and now targets the one who created him Heimerdinger.

Stats
Health: 580 (+90 per level)
Attack Damage 55 (+4 per level)
Attack Speed 0.66 (+2.75% per level)
Movement Speed 345
Health Regen 9.75 per second (+1 per level)
Armour: 32.5 (+2.5 per level)
Magic Resist: 28.95 (+1.5 per level)


Roles
Fighter/Tank 


Abilities

Passive – Cyber Enhancement
T.R.E.X gains 1.39% per level (Max 25.02%) of Armour & Magic Resist also has a 5% chance to block an attack

Q – Flame Sword/Flamethrower

 No Cost

EXO Form: T.R.E.X sword becomes engulfed in fire and increases Attack Power by 5/10/15/20/25% for 5 seconds, this will also cause burn damage of (2/4/6/8/10% of Attack power) to the attacked enemy. (Cool down of 8 seconds)
Reptile Form: T.R.E.X unleashes a huge flame thrower which Damages for 62/130/198/256/324 (+80% of Ability Power). (5 second cool down)

W – Shield slam/Earthquake

No Cost

EXO Form: T.R.E.X slams his shield in to the ground causing enemies movement speed to be slowed by 10/15/20/25/30% and silences the enemy for 2 seconds. (10 second Cool Down)
Reptile Form: T.R.E.X stamps his foot causing the earth to crack around Damaging for (50/90/130/170/210 + 50% of Attack Damage) anyone in his path also will be stunned for 2 second’s. (8 second cool down)

E – Shield Overload/Tail Whip

No Cost

EXO Form: T.R.E.X absorbs damage for (1/2/3/4/5 seconds) then erupts from shield dealing (5/10/15/20/25% + 50% of ability) back as damage. (10 second Cool down) 

Reptile Form: T.R.E.X whips his tail dealing (60/100/140/180/220 + 100% attack power) send enemies in the air. (10 second cool down)

R – Transformation

No Cost

T.R.E.X leaps and transforms in to reptile mode gaining (10/15/20% movement speed increase), (2/5/10% attack speed increase). Also dealing 160/285/400 (+70% Attack Power) to the location where he lands.

Form Last 15 seconds then reverts back to EXO form. (120 second cool down time)

Thanks For reading, interested in everyone's thoughts
Hairywookie.
